page.title: 14CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: When I play out with my friends we play at things like take-off or we play in the park near our house.To play take-off you have a team of girls and a team of boys.The girls run first and the boys have to catch them and tig them three times on the head.Then they take them to their home base when every one is captured it is the boys turn to run.Sometimes we just hang around the shops or sit on a wall and talk.My friends names are Nicola,Mark,Stephen and sometimes Rachel,Darren and Brian.Sometimes the boys play football in the park field, while we just sit around doing nothing.My friends are fantastic. Organised activities take place at NORMANTON COMMUNITY CENTRE,these include Disco, Gym club, Karate,Ballet etc .The centre is a meeting place for pensioner groups.
